title: Year of the Goat Icon
body: Riot is the Year of the Goat icon been given yet. I gifted my brother a mystery gift during Lunar Revel but haven't received it yet so I am wondering if it's still being handed out or I've been forgotten C:

replies.body: I had to send a support ticket in order to receive mine.
K i've sent a support ticket so hopefully I will receive it soon :D

Hi :^)
Same with Klavin I had to send a support ticket for mine to come too.
*turns on the riot signal spotlight and points it into the sky*
